cards.name: Extra Vote
cards.description: You may use this card in secret during a Tribal Council to vote for a player.

cards.name: Immunity Idol
cards.description: Can only be played at Tribal Council after all players have voted, but before votes are tallied. Any votes for you (or the player you choose) do not count.

cards.name: Idol Nullifier
cards.description: Can only be played after an immunity idol, but before votes are tallied. Cancels that immunity idol.

cards.name: Sorry for You
cards.description: Can be played any time someone tries to take cards from you. Instead, they get nothing from you and must discard 1 card.

cards.name: Let's Form an Alliance
cards.description: Pick a player to be your partner. You both steal a random card from 1 player each (you can pick the same player).

cards.name: Reward Challenge: It's a Numbers Game
cards.description: On three, all players show 1-5 fingers. The player who shows the lowest unique number steals 2 random cards from any player.

cards.name: Reward Challenge: Power Pair
cards.description: On three, 3 players (including you) hold out 1, 2, or 3 fingers. If 2 are the same, each steals 1 card from the 3rd player. If all are the same, each discards 1 card. If all are different, play again.

cards.name: Reward Challenge: Do or Die
cards.description: Play Rock Paper Scissors against any player. If you tie, swap 1 card with them. If you don't, the winner steals 2 cards from the loser.

cards.name: Camp Raid
cards.description: Place in front of any player. You take the next card they draw after they look at it, then discard this card.

cards.name: The Spy Shack
cards.description: Look at any player's cards and take one.

cards.name: Knowledge is Power
cards.description: Ask any player for a card by name. If they have it, they must give you one.

cards.name: Tribal Advantage: Control the Vote
cards.description: Can only be played at Tribal Council. Take any player's vote card. You MUST use it in addition to your vote card at this Tribal Council.

cards.name: Tribal Advantage: Goodwill Gamble
cards.description: Can only be played at Tribal Council. Give this card to any other player. This counts as 1 vote and MUST be used at this Tribal Council.

cards.name: Tribal Advantage: I'm the Leader Now
cards.description: Can only be played at Tribal Council. You are the Tribal Council Leader and it's your turn when the Tribal Council ends.
